vclaim: Sigmund Freud, the founder of psychoanalysis, said, “Before you diagnose yourself with depression or low self-esteem, first make sure you are not, in fact, just surrounded by assholes.”
title: Did Freud Say Before Diagnosing Yourself With Depression, Make Sure You Are Not Just ‘Surrounded By Assholes’?
subtitle: Sigmund Freud had some questionable scientific views, but was this one of them?
author: Nur Ibrahim
